thread.title: Lyft, Uber drivers’ turnover high, wages low, survey finds
thread.title_full: Lyft, Uber drivers’ turnover high, wages low, survey finds - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Carolyn Said
title: Lyft, Uber drivers’ turnover high, wages low, survey finds
text:
Photo: Jeff Chiu, Associated Press A survey of drivers working for Uber and other ride services finds that a large proportion of them don’t stick with the on-demand work for very long. A survey of drivers working for Uber and other ride services finds...
Most drivers for Uber and Lyft are newbies, according to a survey released Friday , which reinforces the idea that many people who try driving their own car for hire don’t stick with it very long. A survey of drivers working for Uber and other ride services finds that a large proportion of them don’t stick with the on-demand work for very long.
